LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_Tox.label: 독성포탄
LanguageData.DeathrestCapacitySerum.label: 죽음안식 수용 혈청
LanguageData.DeathrestCapacitySerum.description: 죽음안식동안 연결 할 수있는 죽음안식 장치의 최대 숫자를 영구적으로 증가시킵니다.\n\n이 혈청은 죽음안식 유전자가 있는 사람에게만 투여할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.NanostructuringChip.label: 나노 구조화 칩
LanguageData.NanostructuringChip.description: 분자를 재구조화 시키는 메카노이드의 미소장기입니다. 일부 고급 메카노이드와 장비를 생산하는데 필요합니다.\n\n기계공학자는 이것을 분석해 상위 메카노이드기술을 연구를 할 수 있습니다.
By studying the {PARENT_label}, {STUDIER_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
LanguageData.PowerfocusChip.label: 동력집중 칩
LanguageData.PowerfocusChip.description: 에너지를 집중시키는 메카노이드의 미소장기입니다. 일부 고급 메카노이드와 장비를 생산하는데 필요합니다.\n\n기계공학자는 이것을 분석해 상위 메카노이드기술을 연구를 할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.PowerfocusChip.comps.CompStudiable.compl: By studying the {PARENT_label}, {STUDIER_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
LanguageData.Shell_Toxic.label: 독성포탄
LanguageData.Shell_Toxic.description: 화학반응 시 치명적인 독성 가스를 생성하는 액체가 들어있는 포탄입니다. 발사되면 일정 시간 동안 바닥에 달라붙야 독성 가스를 방출합니다.\n\n독성 가스는 폐와 눈을 자극해 일시적인 호흡곤란과 시력 저하를 일으킵니다. 독성 가스에 계속 노출되면 독성 축적이 되며 결국 사망하게 됩니다.
LanguageData.Shell_Toxic_Releasing.label: 독성포탄
LanguageData.Shell_Toxic_Releasing_Water.label: 독성포탄
LanguageData.SignalChip.label: 신호 칩
LanguageData.SignalChip.description: 메카노이드 대역신호 동기화에 쓰이는 메카노이드의 미소장기입니다. 일부 고급 메카노이드와 장비를 생산하는데 필요합니다.\n\n기계공학자는 이것을 분석해 상위 메카노이드기술을 연구를 할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.SignalChip.comps.CompStudiable.completed: By studying the {PARENT_label}, {STUDIER_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
LanguageData.SubcoreBasic.label: 기본 서브코어
LanguageData.SubcoreBasic.description: The simplest possible mechanoid brain, this is a tiny psychodynamic substrate unit housing a dull subpersona. Since this is only a basic-tier subcore, it can only drive the simplest of mechanoids.\n\nLike all mechanoid subcores, it contains a subpersona with a psychic presence, albeit a very faint one.
LanguageData.SubcoreHigh.label: 상급 서브코어
LanguageData.SubcoreHigh.description:
A high-tier mechanoid brain, this is a psychodynamic substrate unit which supports a sophisticated subpersona. This particular subcore is of the strongest tier, and can power complex ultra-heavy mechanoids.

The subpersona inside this core approaches a live human in its complexity, though it is of a very different nature. Like any such mind, it has a noticeable psychic presence.

This subcore could only have been produced by rich pattern transfer from another sophisticated mind. The only way to do this without huge facilities is to ripscan a living person's brain, killing them in the process.
LanguageData.SubcoreRegular.label: 표준 서브코어
LanguageData.SubcoreRegular.description: A standard-tier mechanoid brain, this is a psychodynamic substrate unit supporting a thinking subpersona. This particular subcore is strong enough to drive standard-tier mechanoids.\n\nMechanoids are more than robots, and this is more than a silicon computer. Its thinking, psychically-present subpersona makes it more adaptable than silicon systems. However, this also means it can only be produced by analog pattern transfer from another thinking mind.
LanguageData.Wastepack.label: 독성 폐기물
LanguageData.Wastepack.description: A compacted package of toxic waste that will slowly dissolve if not frozen. The surface is heat-sealed for safe transport. Wastepacks will pollute the surrounding terrain if they dissolve, deteriorate, or are otherwise destroyed.\n\nToxic wastepacks are flammable. If burned or damaged, they will release tox gas.
